Class TaskList

public final class TaskList
extends java.lang.Object

Static utility methods to parse and edit task lists

Method Detail

addTask

public static java.lang.String addTask(java.lang.String taskId,
                                       java.lang.String list)
Add a new task to the given list

Parameters:
taskId - The task to add to the list
list - The list to add to; a delimited string
Returns:
The new list with the new task added UNLESS that task was already in the list

removeTask

public static java.lang.String removeTask(java.lang.String taskId,
                                          java.lang.String list)
Remove a task from a list

Parameters:
taskId - The task to be removed
list - The list to remove the task from
Returns:
The updated list with the task removed if it was in the list, otherwise returns a copy of list

containsTask

public static boolean containsTask(java.lang.String taskId,
                                   java.lang.String list)
Check if a task is in a list

Parameters:
taskId - The task to check for
list - The list to check
Returns:
True if taskId exists in the delimited list or false otherwise

getList

public static java.lang.String[] getList(java.lang.String input)
Return an array of task ids for the given delimited list of tasks

Parameters:
input - The delimited string of tasks
Returns:
An array of strings, each element representing a task id from the given list
